title: Subway Station Aesthetic
prompt: A candid aesthetic photo of a young woman at a metro/subway station, smiling naturally while wearing casual chic clothes — a floral tank top, high-waisted jeans, and a tote bag. Soft cinematic lighting, warm tones, Pinterest-style, lifestyle aesthetic, urban background with a train passing by. Natural long hair, authentic happy vibe.

title: 1/6 Scale Figurine Portrait
prompt: Create a 1/6 scale commercialized figurine of the characters in the picture, in a realistic style, in a real environment. The figurine is placed on a computer desk. The figurine has a round transparent acrylic base, with no text on the base. The content on the computer screen is the ZBrush modeling process of this figurine. Next to the computer screen is a BANDAI-style toy packaging box printed with the original artwork. The packaging features two-dimensional flat illustrations.

title: 1/7 Scale Figurine with Real Person
prompt: Create a 1/7 scale commercialized figurine of the character in the picture, realistic style, in a real environment. Figurine placed on a computer desk with a round transparent acrylic base. Next to the desk is the real person in the picture, life-sized, in the same attire as the figurine, cleaning the figurine carefully with a fine brush. Scene set in a modern styled studio room, brightly lit, with a collection of toys and action figures in the background.

title: Park Bench Casual Portrait
prompt: 8K ultra-realistic photo of an Asian woman, keeping the face unchanged from the reference. She is sitting casually on a park bench surrounded by greenery. Outfit: olive green polo t-shirt, beige chinos, and white sneakers. Accessories: smartwatch and sunglasses. Relaxed outdoor mood, warm daylight with trees in the background.

title: 1/7 Scale Figurine on Desk
prompt: A 1/7 scale figurine of a character from an unspecified picture, rendered in realistic PVC material and placed on a computer desk. The figurine stands on a round transparent acrylic base without text. Environment: indoor studio; the computer screen displays the brush modeling process of the figurine. Packaging: a BANDAI-style toy packaging box with original artwork and two-dimensional flat illustrations should be placed next to the computer screen; an additional model packaging box with the character printed on it should be positioned behind the figurine.

title: Overhead Lamborghini Hood Shot
prompt: Overhead high-angle 3:4 full-body shot of a woman lying relaxed on the hood of an orange Lamborghini Urus in a dim basement garage. Outfit: crisp white open-collar shirt, brown trousers, polished shoes, leather strap watch. Visible tattoo on forearm. Soft sunbeam lighting with natural reflections on car, cinematic warm color grading, shallow depth of field creamy bokeh, hyper-realistic 8K detail, billionaire vibe.

title: Penthouse Lounge Portrait
prompt: DSLR-style 4K ultra-realistic photo — a stylish woman (face and hair exactly as in uploaded image) is sitting casually on a sleek black leather lounge chair. She wears a crisp white professional suit, slim-fit navy chinos, and white sneakers. Accessories: silver wristwatch and aviator sunglasses. Posture: relaxed with a confident smile. Background: luxury penthouse living room with floor-to-ceiling windows, modern grey sofas, indoor plants, and warm natural daylight streaming in.

title: Starbucks Terrace Portrait
prompt: Generate a hyper-realistic cinematic photo of the uploaded person (preserve the face 100% exactly as in the uploaded selfie). The subject is sitting at an outdoor Starbucks terrace table, holding a Starbucks cup with '[Blogger Vinital' handwritten on it in marker. Outfit: light beige short-sleeve linen shirt, slim black trousers, clean white sneakers; sunglasses resting on collar. Background: sunlit urban street with people walking and blurred traffic; green Starbucks branding visible in the scene.

title: European Street Portrait
prompt: Ultra-realistic cinematic street portrait in a narrow European city street with tall stone buildings and blurred storefronts. Subject standing in the middle of the street, slightly angled, confident gaze. Outfit: black overcoat and black scarf for a minimal stylish vibe. Lighting: overcast daylight with smooth shadows and balanced contrast. Color grading: cinematic teal-orange with soft desaturated background and natural skin tones. Camera: DSLR 85mm lens, 1/1.8, medium waist-up shot, vertical 4:5. Style: cinematic editorial, modern and timeless magazine look.

title: Rooftop Balcony Portrait
prompt: 8K ultra-realistic portrait preserving the same face reference. Look: black turtleneck sweater, grey checked blazer, slim-fit dark jeans, sunglasses. Action: leaning on balcony railing with one arm while holding a book in the other hand. Setting: rooftop balcony at golden hour with a city skyline. Mood: intellectual, cinematic, reflective.

It should feel like a 90s movie dark-brown wavy curly hair baddie with a small flower tucked visibly into her curls, romanticising a windy environment. The girl stands against a solid wall with deep shadows and contrast drama. Lighting is warm with golden tones evoking sunset or golden hour. The background is minimalist and slightly textured. title: Banarasi Saree Retro Portrait

title: Maharani Royal Portrait
prompt: A regal vintage-style portrait of a young woman using the provided face and natural features, styled as a Maharani from royal Rajasthan. She wears a richly embroidered heavy lehenga with a full-sleeve blouse and an ornate dupatta draped over her head. Outfit includes intricate embroidery, paired with traditional jewelry — choker, long rani haar, maang tikka, small red bindi, and a large stack of colorful bangles. Wavy curly hair flows softly from under the dupatta, lifted slightly by a breeze. She smiles and giggles gracefully while looking into a vintage mirror. Background: a royal palace room dimly lit with candles and diyas, warm, mystical, and dramatic ambiance with a subtle smoky effect. Overall vibe: royal, timeless, cinematic, and elegantly moody.

title: Pastel Pink Cotton Saree
prompt: A soft-focus, pastel-hued retro aesthetic shot. The girl wears a handwoven pale pink cotton saree with delicate embroidery. Her silky hair is tied into a loose braid with fresh jasmine strands woven in. She stands in a sunlit courtyard surrounded by clay pots and bougainvillea vines, shy yet graceful, adjusting her braid, evoking the charm of a 90s romantic heroine.

title: Lotus Boat Dream Portrait
prompt: A dreamy, ethereal portrait of a serene woman sitting in a boat surrounded by lotus flowers, wearing a delicate dreamy saree with puff sleeves, holding a bouquet of lotus flowers and gazing over her shoulder with a gentle smile. Her light-brown hair is softly styled and flows slightly in the wind. The pond is bathed in soft golden natural light with dew-kissed pink lotuses and subtle green foliage, and a hint of mist creating a magical romantic atmosphere. Preserve the facial details from the provided photo.

title: Glamorous Birthday Spotlight Portrait
prompt: Create a glamorous birthday photoshoot portrait with flash. The backdrop is a plain neutral wall illuminated by a round spotlight that casts a sharp, dramatic shadow behind the subject for a cinematic effect.
